summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is crucial to investigate and optimize this page to improve its loading time and pass the test.
insights: The homepage, pricing page, and blog page perform well, but optimizing their load times can further enhance user experience.
The "How It Works" page's failure indicates bottlenecks that need to be identified and resolved. This may include optimizing images, minifying CSS and JavaScript, or reducing server response time.
Regularly monitoring and addressing web performance issues can help maintain a positive user experience and improve search engine rankings.
